full_text:
Page 1331
To: [redacted]
From: Hugh Hurwitz
Cc: Ray Ormond
Subject: RE: Draft language
Sent: Mon, 12 Aug 2019 03:12:07 +0000

Thanks. This is helpful. We can talk tomorrow about the timing.

It will also be helpful to get some information about staffing at MCC I've seen additional press reports trying to link the staffing shortages, overtime and this incident.

Thanks,
[redacted]

From: Hugh Hurwitz
Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2019 9:53 PM
To: [redacted]
Cc: Ray Ormond
Subject: Draft language

[redacted] as discussed, several options are below. Please note that we should discuss timing of all this. I will need to ensure staff are notified first, and I should let my Executive Staff know so they are not taken off guard as they will no doubt get a lot of questions from their staff and other wardens. Also note that the Warden just called Ray and told him the US Attorney is meeting with him at 10 am tomorrow. So this probably should be some time after that interview.

[redacted]

Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The redactions are likely due to sensitive or personal information.
